Class BankAccount

java.lang.Object
ExternalAccs.BankAccount
public class BankAccount extends Object
Represents a bank account associated with a card, containing information such as card number, holder name, expiry date, CVV, OTP, and bank name.

  • Constructor Summary

    Description

    Default constructor for BankAccount.
    BankAccount(String BankName, String CardNumber, String CardHolderName, String expiryDate, int otp, int cvv)
    Constructs a BankAccount with full card and bank details.

  • Constructor Details

    • BankAccount

      public BankAccount()
      Default constructor for BankAccount.

    • BankAccount

      public BankAccount(String BankName, String CardNumber, String CardHolderName, String expiryDate, int otp, int cvv)
      Constructs a BankAccount with full card and bank details.
      Parameters:
      BankName - the name of the bank
      CardNumber - the card number in string format
      CardHolderName - the full name of the cardholder
      expiryDate - the expiry date in format day-month-year
      otp - the OTP (6-digit code)
      cvv - the CVV (3- or 4-digit code)

  • Method Details

    • getOTP

      public int getOTP()
      Gets the OTP (One-Time Password) associated with the account.
      Returns:
      the OTP as an integer

    • getCVV

      public int getCVV()
      Gets the CVV (Card Verification Value) of the card.
      Returns:
      the CVV as an integer

    • getCardNumber

      public String getCardNumber()
      Gets the card number.
      Returns:
      the card number as a string

    • getCardHolderName

      public String getCardHolderName()
      Gets the card holder's name.
      Returns:
      the name of the card holder

    • getExpiryDate

      public String getExpiryDate()
      Gets the expiry date of the card.
      Returns:
      the expiry date in the format day-month-year

    • getBankName

      public String getBankName()
      Gets the name of the bank.
      Returns:
      the bank name

    • gatherInfo

      public void gatherInfo(String bankName)
      Gathers bank account information interactively from the user via the console. Validates CVV, card number, expiry date (day, month, year), cardholder name, and OTP.
      Parameters:
      bankName - the name of the bank associated with the card
